name: 타닥토닥(Pat Pat Tapping)_Single Play Ver.
description:
This is a typing game with a custom keyboard below and the single play version of it.

https://songheejo.com/22552501

 

 

Consolation is light.

For you or me, these are the times to be lucky to be safe today.

I have something to say,

in the cold air and dark sky,

azimuth and altitude are given to each of us.

Until I die here,

I'll try to shine on my own.

The energy you once had.

The vivid warmth we shared.

I really hope

that we can be together indefinitely.

As the light of my star reveals your star,

now your starlight spreads my world.

So let's embroider a little more together.

It's not the stars that rise.

It's only covered by clouds temporarily.

Even now, your light will not hesitate to spread out.

 

 

The creator

likes your touch.

I pray today

for your safe return.
